name: victory-star
effect: All friendly Pokémon's moves, including this Pokémon's own moves, have 1.1× their usual accuracy while this Pokémon is in battle.
short_effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
